record.field: Confirmation Email for CE Creation Lead Receipt
[Somcomunitats.coop] New Community Creation Request to the platform

Hello,

Thank you for filling out the form and requesting the membership of your Energy Community on the Somcomunitats.coop platform.

In the coming weeks we will study the application and contact you to indicate the steps and the information necessary to complete the registration process for the Community and the people who are part of it.

Here is a copy of the data we received:

- Community name: ${object.name}

- Description: ${object.description}

- Address: ${object.street}

- Zip code: ${object.zip}

- City: ${object.city}

- Email: ${object.email_from}

- Phone: ${object.phone}

% if object.form_submission_metadata_ids: % for meta in object.form_submission_metadata_ids: % if meta.value: % if meta.key == 'partner_qty_members':

- Members: ${meta.value}

% endif % if meta.key == 'partner_legal_state':

- Activity state: ${meta.value}

% endif % if meta.key == 'partner_foundation_date':

- Foundation date: ${meta.value}

% endif % if meta.key == 'partner_vat':

- Activity state: ${meta.value}

% endif % if meta.key == 'partner_comments':

- Comments: ${meta.value}

% endif % if meta.key == 'partner_firstname':

- Contact firstname: ${meta.value}

% endif % if meta.key == 'partner_lastname':

- Contact lastname: ${meta.value}

% endif % if meta.key == 'contact2_firstname':

- Contact 2 firstname: ${meta.value}

% endif % if meta.key == 'contact2_lastname':

- Contact 2 lastname: ${meta.value}

% endif % if meta.key == 'contact2_email':

- Contact 2 email: ${meta.value}

% endif % if meta.key == 'contact2_mobile':

% endif % endif % endfor % endif % if object.tag_ids:

${tag.name}

% endfor % endif

We keep in touch for any questions.

Yours faithfully,

Somcomunitats.coop team
